entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: Mentioned as the one making a request at 399. The text does not provide any further description about Lord Voldemort.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts. He is mentioned as being late and having an office where Harry visits him.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts who is in a hurry to meet Dumbledore. The text does not provide any further description about Harry.

entities.name: sybill trelawney
entities.description: A professor at Hogwarts who is mentioned as being thrown unceremoniously from Dumbledore's office.

relationships.description: Dumbledore and Sybill Trelawney have a conflict as indicated by the text where Dumbledore says 'there is no question of throwing you unceremoniously' from his office.
